div.bibl: Forward, October 30, 1920Extra Announcement from the Ukrainian Society.

body.p: Monday all the clothes that the Ukrainian Society gathered for our unfortunate brothers and sisters in Ukrainia will be send from Chicago to New York. The ship leaves New York the 12th of November. All the Ukrainain societies which have gathered clothes for that purpose are cordially asked to call the attention of Dr. Pomrenze - Telephone No. Lawndale 1778.
